page.title: 10Culcheth Youth Club
page.content: Our Youth Club provides much pleasure and varies activies and interest for young people. The activities include photography, tennis, badminton and computer games. They also run a Junior Club on a Thursday night which involves much the same thing. The Youth Club today helps unemployed and youngsters in trouble. To help the unemployed our youth club started a Contact Club which involes games of pool, badminton, television or any other sport. The Youth Club leaders help members in different ways. They help with problems and they help the unemployed find jobs. After 3 months, if the members have not got a job, they take them on as volunteer workers. Our Youth Club is run by a neighbourhood worker called Dave Russell.
